channel.title: [317] Hoodconnection V2 [THE GHETTO MEDIEVAL! - Rastafari Skill]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i55.tinypic.com/2jchabs.png[/img] [size=16pt]Some of the old members here might remember [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,391633.0.html]Hoodconnection[/url] which had good summoning for it's time, and I with EmpireScape (my thread got deleted). Me and Deathspirit were working as a team and sharing codes between our servers. After a long year break, we've decided to get back to working and this is our project. Sadly he got banned for some reason and i'm making and will update this thread.[/size]
[size=15pt]Server development ends on December 1st. It is already stuffed with content that is handled very stable, till December this server will have even more content which will never get you bored to play it![/size]
This server will contain the 2005 Christmas event along with custom skills like Rastafari. The skill itself will allow you to use drugs, and to grow weed, etc. How harder the drug how higher your level needs to be to be able to use.
List of Hoodconnection's Drugs: (Level 1) Weed. You can grow this. Items needed to use: Paper. (Level 20) Hashish. You can buy this. Items needed to use: Paper. (Level 40) Amphetamine. You can make this. Items needed to use: Sniffing Pipe. (Level 60) Cocaïne. You can make this. Items needed to use: Sniffing Pipe. (Level 80) Heroïn. You can buy this. Items needed to use: Needle.
To train the skill you will need a quest which is done making. Screens of the quest will be posted soon.
Legend: [img]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/icojoy/noshadow/standart/gif/24x24/001_06.gif[/img] - Done [img]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/icojoy/shadow/standart/png/24x24/001_39.png[/img] - Under construction [img]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/woothemesiconset/32/close.png[/img] - Not yet
[size=18pt][b]Main Features:[/b][/size] [size=14pt]Custom quests[/size] - [img]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/icojoy/shadow/standart/png/24x24/001_39.png[/img] [size=14pt]Every combat skill working[/size] - [img]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/icojoy/noshadow/standart/gif/24x24/001_06.gif[/img] [size=14pt]Cooking[/size] - [img]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/woothemesiconset/32/close.png[/img] [size=14pt]Prayer[/size] - [img]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/icojoy/noshadow/standart/gif/24x24/001_06.gif[/img] [size=14pt]Woodcutting[/size] - [img]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/icojoy/noshadow/standart/gif/24x24/001_06.gif[/img] [size=14pt]Firemaking[/size] - [img]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/woothemesiconset/32/close.png[/img] [size=14pt]Agility[/size] - [img]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/woothemesiconset/32/close.png[/img] [size=14pt]Fishing[/size] - [img]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/icojoy/noshadow/standart/gif/24x24/001_06.gif[/img] [size=14pt]Smithing[/size] - [img]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/woothemesiconset/32/close.png[/img] [size=14pt]Mining[/size] - [img]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/woothemesiconset/32/close.png[/img] [size=14pt]Fletching[/size] - [img]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/woothemesiconset/32/close.png[/img] [size=14pt]Slayer[/size] - [img]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/woothemesiconset/32/close.png[/img] [size=14pt]Reputation[/size] - [img]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/icojoy/shadow/standart/png/24x24/001_39.png[/img] [size=14pt]Thieving[/size] - [img]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/icojoy/noshadow/standart/gif/24x24/001_06.gif[/img] [size=14pt]Custom skills[/size] - [img]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/icojoy/shadow/standart/png/24x24/001_39.png[/img] [size=14pt]Player Killing[/size] - [img]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/icojoy/noshadow/standart/gif/24x24/001_06.gif[/img] - More to come!!
[b]Update log:[/b]
27/08/11: Updated the Rastafari skill, you can now pick weed with a Rake.
26/08/11 Added a new quest which is called The Mass Murder, which is soon going to have a video.
26/08/11: Clipped almost every area where players will be the most of the times. 25/08/11: There's music added on regions, leveling up, dying, and so on. 25/08/11: A few bugs fixed also Prayer skill is 100% done now. Successfully loading the headicons and skull icons through cache and not that custom bs. 24/08/11: Levelup sounds added for each skill 23/08/11: A lot of music and sounds on areas. 21/08/11: Client background made! - http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/5215/naamloosps.png 20/08/11: Gambling improved: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TWkCgh4EucY <-- Awesomeness :o 20/8/11: Marionettes work fully now, and thesame for the destroying every event item. (Easy but it had to be done anyway, to complete it even more). 19/08/11: A nice Fishing skill class made, under construction. 14/08/11: New welcome screen: http://i51.tinypic.com/19wbqe.png 08/08/11: Message System v1 added! Video - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qd-_rdDBAyc We will be improving this even more. 08/08/11: Fixed Diango's Workshop by clipping every object/wall to make NPC's walk around perfectly without noclipping through. 06/08/11 - Gambling and reputation: [url=http://img508.imageshack.us/img508/1523/39173443.png]Picpocketing[/url] | [url=http://img40.imageshack.us/img40/661/zzzhw.png]Gambler[/url] | [url=http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/621/zzzzrl.png]Gaining reputation[/url] 02/08/11 - What is the marijuana icon for? http://i54.tinypic.com/29579nd.png 26/07/11 - Rehabilitation Centre added http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VlUS71ANkxU It's for when you're high, you go there and the doctor fixes you up. We also have added a mapicon there (Red cross) 26/07/11 - Quest for Rastarafi skill has been completed, here is a video preview: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kf3BqpWFRW4
[hr]
[b][size=19pt]Client:[/size][/b] [img]http://img193.imageshack.us/img193/7008/clientx.png[/img]
[b][size=18pt]Smoking weed and getting high - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VlUS71ANkxU[/size][/b]
[hr] [b][size=19pt]Some screens:[/size][/b] [img]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/3063/1337357.png[/img] [img]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/4369/13374.png[/img] [img]http://img88.imageshack.us/img88/9868/13373.png[/img] [img]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/3041/13372.png[/img] [img]http://img69.imageshack.us/img69/7776/13371.png[/img] [img]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/2227/1337o.png[/img]
[hr]
[size=19pt][b]Christmas event 2005 Hoodconnection:[/b][/size] Images are removed. Now got videos of the event:
Part 1 of the event: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9qo7zIQK1YU Part 2: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=059wsBVX7Z8
[hr]
[size=18pt]Custom Quests:[/size] Criminal Huntdown - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aRUk4eGHiDw Illegal Business (The quest to start the Rastafari skill) - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kf3BqpWFRW4
The server will be launched at Christmas, you will be able to play it fully 24/7. This thread will be updated whenever we change something to the server.
[b][size=18pt]Current Developers:[/size][/b] Deathspirit Mitko

item.title: [317] Hoodconnection V2 [THE GHETTO MEDIEVAL! - Rastafari Skill]
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“TheDeathSpirit, post:83, topic:406306”][quote author=Mitko link=topic=503303.msg3737214#msg3737214 date=1315044743]
This thread won’t be updated anymore since no one really cares so it’s not worth the effort taking photos, videos and all that of the new unique content. We will privately update the stuff and keep it all to ourselves and then finally release the server to the public. We don’t want people copying ideas anyways.

If you want to play RuneScape, play the original.

Praise the same-old remakes, forget the unique! Keep it up guys.
[/quote]Agreed with Mitko, go on, and go play old school remakes.
They will all fail one by one, some day you will realize that all you’ve done will fail. ;D
Then you will think back at the moment that I posted this,
go play fucking RuneScape if you want to play something which already exists.
This where my last words for the MoparScape and Rune-Serba community,
thanks for reading, and fuck a lot bitch ass motherfuckers (people who don’t even give a tiny fuck).

I hope some day people open their eyes to realize that creativity is the true key to succes.
That’s obviously why JaGeX’s game RuneScape was such a great succes.[/quote]

agreed, and rep++

Read full topic
item.source: [317] Hoodconnection V2 [THE GHETTO MEDIEVAL! - Rastafari Skill]

[quote=“Mitko, post:81, topic:406306”]This thread won’t be updated anymore since no one really cares so it’s not worth the effort taking photos, videos and all that of the new unique content. We will privately update the stuff and keep it all to ourselves and then finally release the server to the public. We don’t want people copying ideas anyways.

If you want to play RuneScape, play the original.

Praise the same-old remakes, forget the unique! Keep it up guys.[/quote]Agreed with Mitko, go on, and go play old school remakes.
They will all fail one by one, some day you will realize that all you’ve done will fail. ;D
Then you will think back at the moment that I posted this,
go play fucking RuneScape if you want to play something which already exists.
This where my last words for the MoparScape and Rune-Serba community,
thanks for reading, and fuck a lot bitch ass motherfuckers (people who don’t even give a tiny fuck).

I hope some day people open their eyes to realize that creativity is the true key to succes.
That’s obviously why JaGeX’s game RuneScape was such a great succes.

item.title: [317] Hoodconnection V2 [THE GHETTO MEDIEVAL! - Rastafari Skill]
item.dc:creator: @TheDeathSpirit TheDeathSpirit
item.description:
@TheDeathSpirit wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:64, topic:406306”]Pathetic video Poser IRL much?[/quote]Pathetic poser? Listen kid, i’ve been into drugs, weapons, and other shit related to criminal activities…
At the end you wish you could go back to the times when you had no problems.
Back then I had enemies who would throw bricks through my window, the police would of come everyday to check my computer and my mobile phone. Now the only thing that keeps me off the streets is programming this server… And you simply come at this thread and tell me i’m a poser? No i’m not, fuck you.

Read full topic
